name: Strange Town
description:
EXPLORE THIS MAGIC UNIVERSE

Strange town is a very fun Multiplayer and local multiplayer role-playing game. You must find who the werewolf is in the morning and at night, you must fight and survive. Of course, hiding is a good option too.

The Roles:
Doctor: Runs to help the injured on the ground and heals them.

Protector: He is the firepower of the town with his hunting rifle. He is a person who is crucial to the survival of the town at night.

Villager: He is not a big threat with his close combat weapons, however, no one can underestimate the power of a group of villagers together.

Mayor: In the morning, he can execute the unanimously decided "Traitor" OR anyone else with his revolver.

WE-RRRE-WOLF: While just an ordinary person in the morning, turns into a ruthless killer at night. His aim is to slaughter all of the townspeople.
